data.title: MOVIE IN THE PARK!!!
data.meta_description: Wyomissing's Parks & Recreation Department Kicks Off Movies in the Park Series with "GHOSTBUSTERS: Frozen Empire" on August 17thThe Wyomissing Parks &
data.text:
Wyomissing's Parks & Recreation Department Kicks Off Movies in the Park Series with "GHOSTBUSTERS: Frozen Empire" on August 17th

The Wyomissing Parks & Recreation Department is thrilled to announce the return of its popular Movies in the Park series, beginning on Saturday evening, August 17th at 8:00 PM at the Happy Hollow Playground. This year’s series kicks off with a thrilling first showing of "GHOSTBUSTERS: Frozen Empire," the latest installment in the iconic Ghostbusters franchise.

Movies in the Park is where the magic of cinema meets the charm of the great outdoors. This community-driven program is all about bringing families, friends, and neighbors together for an evening of entertainment and connection under the stars. As our parks and playgrounds transform into outdoor theaters, you’ll experience the magic of movies like never before.

Whether you prefer lounging on blankets and pillows or setting up lawn chairs, Movies in the Park creates a special atmosphere for enjoying a diverse selection of films, from timeless classics to animated favorites. Bring your favorite movie snacks and settle in for a night of fun under the stars. It's so much more than just a regular movie night—our programming aims to strengthen community bonds and create a safe, enjoyable environment for all.

“We’re excited to kick off this year’s series with a blockbuster like ‘GHOSTBUSTERS: Frozen Empire,’” said Randy McKinley, Director of Recreation for the Borough of Wyomissing. “I still remember seeing the original with Bill Murray and Dan Aykroyd—those iconic moments that made us laugh, gasp, and cheer. I can’t wait to share this experience with everyone under the stars. It’s going to be a nostalgic and thrilling night!”

The Wyomissing Parks & Recreation Department invites everyone to follow our updates, invite your friends, and be part of the Movies in the Park magic. Join us on August 17th at Happy Hollow Playground for a memorable night that you won't want to miss.
